page.title: 20CREDITS : WALL & DIST. AREA.
page.content: The following members of Wall W.I. took part in the Domesday Project for the Wall and District Area: Betty Amphlett Pat Ellett Dorothy Middleton Pearl Price Pat Sharp Margaret Southall Margaret Wilson. Thanks are due to the many local residents and business organisations who kindly supplied material for our texts, and Mr.R.H.Lloyd of Shire Oak School for his help in the early stages of the project. Finally, Mr.K.Smithem and student Philip Ellett of Friary Grange School, Lichfield, Computer Department. Text Editor and Co-ordinator, Pat Ellett, Wall W.I., October, 1985.
